paragraphs.text:
val dfInteractions = sqlContext.read
    .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")
    .option("header", "true") // Use first line of all files as header
    .option("inferSchema", "true") // Automatically infer data types
    .option("delimiter", "\t")
    .load("/home/ama/sidana/recommendersystemchallenge/data/data/interactions.csv")
    
val ratings_positive_temp = dfInteractions.filter(dfInteractions("interaction_type") === 1||dfInteractions("interaction_type")===2||dfInteractions("interaction_type")===3)
val ratings_positive_items = ratings_positive_temp.groupBy("item_id")
ratings_positive_items.tordd.coalesce(1, true).saveAsTextFile("/tmp/sidana/item_users.csv")
